alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 2:34AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong wind gusts from weakening thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Gosper and Dawson Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 232 AM CDT, automated weather stations reported strong wind gusts associated with weakening thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles north of Gothenburg to 6 miles east of Wellfleet. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Automated Weather Station at North Platte Airport has measured several gusts near 60 MPH. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sumner and Eddyville. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 209 and 238. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds, such as at Johnson Lake, should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.
